comments:
I am getting this error when my laptop is getting out of sleep mode, probably while network is still reconnecting or something like that.

-- Error Log --
Date: Mon Mar 05 09:57:00 PST 2007
Message: Unable to retrieve query results from http://jira.codehaus.org
java.net.UnknownHostException: jira.codehaus.org
Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.mylar.tasklist
Stack Trace:
org.eclipse.mylar.internal.jira.core.service.ServiceUnavailableException: java.net.UnknownHostException: jira.codehaus.org

Caused by: java.net.UnknownHostException: jira.codehaus.org

*** Bug 177950 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Parsing exception are now propagated correctly and not logged to the error log anymore. Please report any future exceptions that are logged to the the error log when synchronizing since these will likely to be caused by programming errors.

Committed fix to CVS.
Excellent.  Will watch the log when working disconnected.
